review_blob: Surprisingly smooth and drinkable. Its not bold, its not spicy, its not menacingly delicious, its just warm blanket delicious. . A good beer to introduce friends to IPA with.
Its very smoked. If you like eating smoked salmon, next to a smokey bonfire, whilst drinking porter, this is for you. I love it.

The 9% worried me and I expected a thick, malty experience. It really is magic. It tasted light with a tiny hint of pineapple somewhere. I dont like fruity beer, but this really worked. A lovely warm buzz after finishing a big bottle. If you had time for one beer before the end of the world, this would be it.
Great IPA. A great place to start and see what you like and dont like about beer. A real Gold Standard in IPAs.
